status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12981461 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build
vgarg I was pointed in your direction for a review.
jfs Sure, can you create github pull request?
jcamachorodriguez jfs Why do we want to set it to nonstrict? Do you know why was it set to strict in first place? cc gopalv

vgarg, strict forces user to specify the partition value statically; we want to set it to non-strict by default so user has flexibility to either specify statically or dynamically coming from the query execution.
vgarg PR created. Sorry, I'm still learning the workflow.
No worries jfs. I have reviewed and left couple of minor comments.
